hero.name: Yash Lahoti BAS, MSE
hero.description: Help differentiate and personalize your application and narrative to stand out from the same old approach. I craft compelling stories that showcase your unique journey and potential.

about_me.title: About Me
about_me.subtitle: The Engineer-Physician Approach
about_me.name: Yash Lahoti
about_me.credentials: MD Candidate @ Mt. Sinai | MSE Artificial Intelligence @ UPenn
about_me.bio: I don't just edit essays; I architect narratives. With a background in AI strategy and clinical research (NY Eye and Ear), I bring an analytical rigor to the admissions process that standard advisors lack. My experience as CTO of SpineSight and my research in deep learning allows me to help applicants position themselves as future innovators in medicine.
about_me.tagline: Engineer-Physician bridging AI innovation with medical excellence to transform medical school admissions consulting.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Insights into the Process
philosophy.text: Applying to medical school is no longer just about grades; it is about narrative coherence. My approach applies 'Systems Engineering' to your application. We deconstruct your life story into data points, identify the strongest thematic threads, and reassemble them into a compelling argument for your admission. We don't just check boxes; we build a case.

items.question: How does your approach differ from other consultants?
items.answer: I combine engineering rigor with medical expertise. Instead of just editing essays, I architect narratives using systems engineering principles to build a compelling case for your admission.

items.question: What is your acceptance rate?
items.answer: Our students achieve a 95% acceptance rate to medical schools, significantly higher than the national average.

items.question: Do you work with all medical school application systems?
items.answer: Yes, I provide guidance for AMCAS, AACOMAS, and TMDSAS applications, as well as preparation for Casper, Snapshot, Duet, and PREview assessments.

items.question: How long does the full-cycle advising program take?
items.answer: The full-cycle program typically spans the entire application year, from initial planning through acceptance, with flexible scheduling to accommodate your timeline.

items.question: Can you help with post-acceptance decisions?
items.answer: Absolutely. I provide guidance on waitlist navigation, school selection after acceptance, and strategic decision-making throughout the process.

resume.professional_summary: Driven medical school admissions consultant with expertise in developing strategic, personalized application narratives. Passionate about leveraging AI and systems engineering principles to help applicants stand out in the competitive medical school admissions process.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What students say about working with me

items.quote: Yash's engineering approach to my application completely transformed how I presented my story. I got accepted to my top choice medical school!
The strategic narrative development helped me stand out in a competitive pool. His AI background brings a unique perspective to admissions consulting.
Working with Yash was a game-changer. His systems engineering approach helped me craft a compelling application that got me multiple acceptances.
